title: Gateway announces merger with eMachines, 1/30/2004
summary:
Twenty-one years ago, on January 30, 2004, Gateway announced it would be merging with eMachines. This brought two 90s computer brands together, but the tie-up didn’t go all that well. Let’s dig in and see what Gateway was thinking, and
